title: 319: Michelle’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 3 (The Jamie Confrontation + Falling for Nayte + Our Immersive Bachelor Horror Experience)
itunes:title: 319: Michelle’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 3 (The Jamie Confrontation + Falling for Nayte + Our Immersive Bachelor Horror Experience)
description:
The Broads are dropping the recap early today - fresh off of watching the latest episode! They discuss the confrontation of Jamie, how Nayte handled everything, Will and Peter’s final battle, catching feelings for Brandon, the Truth or Dare date?!, prayers that Rodney does not get friend zoned, and more! Then they spiral into creating an immersive Bachelor horror experience and it gets a bit hectic…enjoy! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***BEST FIENDS: Download Best fiends FREE today on the App Store or Google Play!

***JENNI KAYNE: Go to JENNIKAYNE.COM to get 15% off your first order when you use code CHATTY at checkout!

***HELLO FRESH: Go to HELLOFRESH.COM/14CHATTY and use code 14CHATTY for up to 14 free meals and 3 free gifts!
